name: Adam Child
comment: When KTM held the world launch for its big 1290 Super Adventure R back in 2017, journalists were whisked away to Peru

name: Jason Critchell
comment: On-road the Super Adventure R is connected to the road despite the long-travel suspension and 21-inch front tire.

name: Johnson Omega
comment: Although the Super Adventure R lost some torque, youâ€™d be hard-pressed to notice.

name: Jason
comment: KTM claims the 1290 Super Adventure R has retained its peak horsepower rating of 160 hp.

name: Ping Pong Antony
comment: Off-road mode knocks the power down from 160hp to 100 hp, making it easier to control in the dirt.

name: Pricilla Andersen
comment: A 7-inch TFT full color display is bright and easy to read.
